Text: If anyone is interested, i've got the orinal TOS too and am thinking about starting seeding these when TNG is finished, but only if anyone wan't em...

yes yes seed tos please
Mr. Fear

Ok, you will get your TOS, so i found someone that are willing to seed TOS for me, so i'm going to start seeding from disc 1 tommorrow. 
But be patient, it's only an 512kb/s connection 8-15 and 1024kb/s 15-8 (GMT +1).

Would be possible to release TNG sesaon 6 in parallel with season 1 and season 7 in parallel with season 2?
Thanks.
Sorry, that's not possible, cause is that i only get the originals as 2 discs every week, so it's not gonna change...
Could you please release the next discs in Dual layer (DVD9)? That way the quality would be preserved to 100%.

Dual Layer? I prefer them as they are - 4.35 GB. And i hope they stay that way. You want 100% quality? Buy them. Full-sized DVDs would mean longer download times, more expansive discs to burn on and a harder time to get people to stay and seed. Besides... 4.35 GBs times 45-50 discs is a whole lot less than full-sized discs.

I will continue releasing these as DVD5, because:
- Half the size (keeping seeders)
- Quality isn't that bad (65% of original)
- Prize for DVD5 media is 27 times cheaper than DVD9
- Going to take to long to seed (4-5 days)

So no matter what, i'll keep these releases as DVD5 and i have no intention of starting releases as DVD9 at a later time.

But for those interested in DVD9 releases, buy or rent em online and release em yourself.
Please upload disc four already...anxiously waiting for it...
